text: KPWW (95.9 FM, Power 95-9) is a radio station broadcasting a Top 40 contemporary hit radio format. Licensed to Hooks, Texas, United States, it serves the Texarkana area. The station is currently owned by Townsquare Media. ==References== ==External links== *KPWW Power 95-9 Official website * PWW Category:Contemporary hit radio stations in the United States Category:Townsquare Media radio stations
title: KPWW
